Articles.Content:
The first playable version of a game I am working on, in which you must help Jebidiah Kerman escape from the mun and make it back to Kerban. Controls are arrow keys. White tanks are Air, Orange tanks are Jetpack fuel and press up again in midair to turn on the jet pack.

http://www./download/rbnaieo9x9oqwhf/MunEscapeAlpha1.0.exe
No way to start over except exit, also, the air is depleted too fast. I think also that the r button should toggle rcs, rather than double tapping up. Good so far, keep it up
